GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY SCORE PRELOAD PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY

AnimationState.Script:
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState()
if Prev == "STATE_SwordBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SwordIdleToSelected") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToSwordSelected") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachutingSword") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_SwordSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SwordSelectedToIdle") end if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_Swordstunned_landing") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachutingSword") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunchSword" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachutingSword") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") end if Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end if Prev == "STATE_SwordSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SwordSelectedToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_SwordBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SwordSelectedToSelected") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_SwordSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SwordSelectedToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end

SuppressionUpdate.IgnoreSuppressionObjectStatus: OVER_WATER AIRBORNE_TARGET PARACHUTING GENERIC_TOGGLE_STATE INSIDE_GARRISON PLAYER_POWER_4

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: MAULED ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
MAULED ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
